analyzed: diṭṭha sute paṭighe ca mute ca

original: Yo hettha na limpati muni tamāhu.
analyzed: yaḥ ha itthā na limpati muni tam āhu
atha sa ṭṭhi sitā sa vitakkā
no pana duṭṭhulla gāhī sa bhikkhu
dhamma dasaḥ iti tam āhu tathatta
tasmin ca a mate a khāte
diṭṭhā iva dhamme yaḥ vicikicchānam chettā
saḥ tam namassam acari mutya pekhaḥ
tam sāvakam sakka mayam pi sabbe
tuvam naḥ satthā tvam anuttarā asi
chinda naḥ vicikiccham brūhi mā ita
majjhā iva naḥ bhāsa samanta cakkhu
ye keci ganthāḥ idha moha maggā

original: No ce hi jātu puriso kilese,
analyzed: no ce hi jātu purisaḥ kilese

original: Taṁ taṁ ahaṁ vīra tatheva maññe;
analyzed: tam tam aham vīra tathā iva maññe

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā vaṅgīso thero gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmai vaṅgīsaḥ theraḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
